original_text: So I went in and saw; and behold every form of creeping things, and abominable beasts, and all the idols of the house of Israel, pourtrayed upon the wall round about.
korean_text: 내가 들어가 보니 각양 곤충과 가증한 짐승과 이스라엘 족속의 모든 우상을 그 사방 벽에 그렸고

sentences.original_text: So I went in and saw
and behold every form of creeping things
and all the idols of the house of Israel
pourtrayed upon the wall round about
